That’s when the oak has done too much. It’s all about balance, you know. You can’t just throw in the kitchen sink and expect it to taste good. That’s what I’m trying to teach you, Daphne. It’s not just about the grapes, it’s about the art of blending and tasting. And believe me, there’s a lot more to it than meets the eye.”
